NewsArticle.Title: Dark Ages Updates
NewsArticle.Content:
Water Dungeon - The next Medenia hunting area will be released on August 16th. The items from the dungeon will include Hwarone combat armors.
Water Spirit - The Water Temple and Water Spirit Worship will also be released on August 16th.
Secondary Helmet Equipment Slot - Non-combat helmets (formal and itemshop helmets) will be updated with the next item shop release so players can wear combat and non-combat helmets at the same time.
Secondary Accessory Slot - Use of the second accessory slot will be sold in the item shop with the next item shop release.
